articles.title: Ripple's XRP set for new all-time high as President Trump announces pro-crypto Mark Uyeda as acting SEC Chair - FXStreet
articles.description: Ripple (XRP) is up 5% on Monday after US President Donald Trump announced pro-crypto Mark Uyeda as the new acting Securities & Exchange Commission (SEC) Chair.
articles.content:
• Ripple's case with SEC could be over with pro-crypto acting Chair Mark Uyeda now leading the agency.
  • XRP on-chain activity reveals that whales have increased their buying pressure.
